Welcome

Welcome to the website of 'Images for All: making the collections work' a project of the Royal Scottish Geographical Society. The RSGS holds a collection of around one hundred and fifty thousand maps, the archives of many travellers as well as those of the RSGS itself, and many images in a variety of formats. The aim of the project is to provide greater access to the collections.

For details of the collections follow the links on the left to archives, maps and images. As more items in the collections are processed, more details will be added to the website, so please visit again.
If you have any comments on the website or questions about the collections we would be very pleased to hear from you.
